name: Dieungun
description:
This game was made in 48 hrs as a part of GMTK Game Jam 2022

Dieungun is a top down roguelike shooter where your gun shoots dice. The higher the rolls, the more the damage dealt. The game gradually ramps up in difficulty as you play, and you get small upgrades periodically.

How to Play:

WASD to Move
Mouse to Aim and Shoot
Collect  to heal and  to randomize the die faces.

Die Behavior:

Effects are stacked over lower rolls

: Do Damage  : Spawn Bullets  : Spawn More Bullets  : Do Double Damage  : Do Triple Damage + Spawn Even More Bullets  : Explosion

Links and Resources used:

Boardgame pack v2 by Kenney Vleugels

Dungeon Tileset by HorusKDI

Modern DOS font by Jayvee Enaguas (HarvettFox96)
